knimeNode.name: Geocoding
knimeNode.shortDescription: Provides latitude and longitude for given addresses.

fullDescription.intro: This node provides latitude and longitude for given addresses by using a Geocoding service. The services from MapQuest and "Bundesamt f체r Kartographie und Geod채sie" require a key/UUID, which have to be entered in the KNIME preferences under KNIME->Geocoding. The MapQuest key can be obtained from https://developer.mapquest.com/. The Bing Map key can be obtained from https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ff428642.aspx. Please contact the "Bundesamt f체r Kartographie und Geod채sie" to get the UUID for its service "gdz_geokodierung".

tab.name: Common
tab.option: The address that should be geocoded.
Some services enforce a request rate for the Geocoding. To satisfy this rate, the user can specify the delay between two request.
In some cases multiple results are returned for a single address. Several options are provided on how to perform in this case.
